Text: Your Newport News OrderThank you for ordering from Newport News Thank you for shopping at Newport News We hope youll be pleased with everything you ordered Your confirmation number for this order is In business hours well send you a separate email with details of your order If you are a member of the Newport News Discount Club your adjusted total will be shown then if you arent a member but would like to be call If you have any questions about your order our customer service associates have the answers Call them at Monday through Friday from am to midnight ET Whens the last time you shopped and smelled the flowers How about the last time you bought yourself a lovely piece of jewelry These featured partner sites presented by newportnewscom have exclusive offers just for you Use any major credit card including your FCNBNewport News Charge Card for purchases from these trusted sites and treat yourself to something special Flowers and Gift Baskets from The Flower Club presented by newportnewscom newportnews Enjoy free shipping when you order from Palm Beach Jewelry presented by newportnewscom
